mechanoreception.notes: As irregular sea urchins living in the deep sea, they likely rely on mechanoreception to detect vibrations and currents in their environment. Inferred from general sea urchin sensory biology and deep-sea lifestyle.

chemoreception.notes: Likely rely on chemoreception to locate food sources and assess water quality in the deep sea environment. Inferred from general sea urchin sensory biology.

vision.notes: The presence or absence of photoreceptors is not mentioned in the provided context. Given the deep-sea habitat, vision may be absent or reduced, but further research is needed.
